Text:
Thank you for keeping the dreamcast alive  I know it is not much support for it now but you are doing a great job. 

  Thnak-you For All Your Hard Work  Peace!!!
Alcohol 120% successfully burned the program to CD.  From what I am reading, your manufacture date on the bottom of your Dreamcast unit must be before October 2000 in order to play burnt discs.
nice 1 4 da upload,appreceiated a lot. long live the dc

Hey I download this torrent, I have daemon tools, and chanksha emulator. I also have alchohol 120% and my dreamcast is over 9 years old, how the hell do I get this to work? All the cdi images are split up. wtf do I do now?

okay the sfv file says there a r01 and r00 but i don't see any such files?
your games are awesome and all the games I've downloaded work great with winrar and alcohol120!!!!!  Good job!!!  All play great on my dc.

This and soul calibur (soul edge) are the best fighting games ever, i mean, this game blew my mind, it mixes 2d and 3d backgrounds, and features awesome characters and movelists

Download this game, you will not be disapointed, i promise.
